Stop-loss strategy: Trailing stop loss with a 10% threshold and 5% incremental adjustment
Set stop loss at 63.81 NTD (10% below the current price), and adjust the stop loss to break-even point when the stock price reaches 80 NTD.
Set stop loss at 63.81 NTD (10% below current price) and adjust as the stock price moves. Criteria: If the stock price falls below the 50-day moving average or if ROE/ROA shows significant decline.
Trailing stop loss with a 10% threshold and a 5% adjustment
